title: Looking for a duo bot lane for casual ranked team
body:
Looking for a bot lane duo to play in our ranked team. Please only add me if you are actually a duo, takes too long to get a new support/adc to create a good synergy and relationship so getting a premade duo saves a lot of time :) If you are a duo do not hesitate to add me no matter what your rank. 
It would be preferable if you can use teamspeak/skype because obviously it helps in communication during games and getting to know one another.

Really helps a lot if you are confident on a variety of champions to fit in with different team comps and counters. 

We are a friendly group of people and welcome everyone! Look forward to meeting you and playing some fun games together :D

replies.body: :( oliver twist always asking for more
Pls sir may I have some more bot laners..
I'm a Supp Main and have two Adcs I work with a lot one is super aggressive the other not as much feel free to add me and we'll come on board and see if you like us
lets do it ill adc should help me get some prac before the climb
